subject: Tennis
Hopman Cup (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: No. 1 Serena Williams credited an on-court coffee for her recovery in a three-set victory over Flavia Pennetta on Monday at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia.
snippet: No. 1 Serena Williams credited an on-court coffee for her recovery in a three-set victory over Flavia Pennetta on Monday at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia.
